price: Аллоҳга истиғфор айтинг! Албатта, Аллоҳ мағфиратли ва раҳмли бўлган Зотдир.
arabic: وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرِ ٱللَّهَۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-is'taghfiri al-laha inna al-laha kāna ghafūran raḥīman
